summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVegane.l.f. SKIN's Holy Hydration! Gel-Yeah Moisturizer is a lightweight, hydrating gel with a bouncy texture that delivers a surge of moisture. The non-greasy formula quickly sinks into the skin, leaving you with a complexion that looks and feels smoother, softer, and plumped the e.l.f. up.
details: DetailsBenefitsA bouncy gel moisturizer that delivers a surge of lightweight moisture for plumped-up, balanced and hydrated skinUnique moisturizing gel texture is lightweight, non-greasy and fast-absorbingInfused with allantoin plus squaleneGreat for: Oily and combination skin100% vegan and cruelty-free, e.l.f. is Leaping BunnyThis product is made in a Fair-Trade Certified facilityKey IngredientsAllantoin - helps to hydrate and plump the look of skinFormulated WithoutSulfates, Phthalates, Parabens, Nonylphenol Ethoxylates, Triclosan, Triclocarban, HydroquinoneItem 2619632How To UseMassage a small amount onto your face and neck, patting skin gently until fully absorbed. Use mornings and evenings after cleansing skin.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Butylene Glycol, Trehalose, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Diglycerin, Squalane, Opuntia Dillenii Extract, Allantoin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Dipropylene Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Arginine, Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Dimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Fragrance (Parfum), Geraniol, Linalool. Ingredients may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the packaging of the product you receive for the list of ingredients in your particular product.
how_to_use: Massage a small amount onto your face and neck, patting skin gently until fully absorbed. Use mornings and evenings after cleansing skin.
ingredients: Linalool. Ingredients may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the packaging of the product you receive for the list of ingredients in your particular product

reviews.headline: Absolutely love!
reviews.comments: Great product. Feels great and lasts a long time. I have repurchased several times. This is a staple and part of my everyday routine.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: I love how hydrating this product is! It' is super refreshing. It is not necessarily heavy like other lotions I have used before, but it is great for whenever my skin starts to feel oily or sweaty. As someone with combination skin type, this is a great product because it does not make me too oily or too dry.

reviews.headline: Wouldn't recommend
reviews.comments: I noughg this gel moisturizer instead if the cream by accident- tried to give it a shot. Dont like it!

reviews.headline: Good product depending on your skin type
reviews.comments: My skin is super dry and whenever I put this on I swear it makes my face more dry. I wanted something lightweight for the summer but I guess this isnt it for me.

reviews.headline: dry skin?
reviews.comments: I've used the leading brands gel moisturizer for years. absolutely love it as I have acne prone skin. instead of my usual re-purchase, I decided to give this product a try. firstly, the consistency. it doesn't pick up easily and literally feels like jello. immediately after application, I didn't feel hydrated at all. within a few days of use, I had DRY SKIN for the first time all over my face! definitely returning.

reviews.headline: Affordable face moisturizer for oily skin
reviews.comments: I recently bought this after it had been on my list for a while. I'm a dermatological girly, but I needed something more affordable in the interim for daily use. So far, I like it — it absorbs quickly. I have oily skin, and it leaves my skin with a glow without feeling or looking greasy. I'll be using this throughout the summer. I can definitely tell the difference between this and a high-end product, but it gets the job done for now.

reviews.headline: Wouldn't repurchase
reviews.comments: I have oily skin and this product made me feel so dry and dehydrated. Almost like I used nothing, really disapponted usually I enjoy gel moisturizers.

reviews.headline: Hated it
reviews.comments: I was trying to find a cheap alternative and thought possibly this would work but it didnt.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I love this product. I usually buy three at a time. Ive used other big name brand products compared to this and they didnt work as good as this one.

reviews.headline: worth it
reviews.comments: I needed a oil free moisturizor because I have combination skin. Chose this moisturizer based on many positive reviews. I was not down this moisturizer is ideal for combination skin. I love ELF

reviews.headline: Leaves skin feeling tight
reviews.comments: As an oily skinned gal I usually love gel moisturizers but this is a total miss for me. It makes my skin feel dry and tight and I'd probably be better off just letting my natural oils do the work. An extra star only because it absorbs really fast and is lightweight.

reviews.headline: Depends...
reviews.comments: I don't LOVE this moisturizer but I don't HATE it. I didn't buy this but it was given by my mom because she has oily skin and she felt like this did nothing. When she said I could have it I tried it out and at first I thought she was crazy because it was hydrating. Overtime it lost it's moisture and became very dry. I haven't seen any improvements to this and this is really the only moisturizer I have been using. I felt like over time it made my skin flakey, clogged, and dry. Disappointed, however, the packaging is very nice and the texture of the moisturizer is nice. But I felt like it did nothing.

reviews.headline: Super Surprised
reviews.comments: I've never used ELF products before and was recommended this as a replacement for my First Aid Beauty coconut water moisturizer and was pleasantly suprised! I like the texture and the light scent. I feel like it has kept my skin balanced and not caused more acne and for 1/3 of the price, I love that!

reviews.headline: Works great!
reviews.comments: I like this cream. Lightweight yet very moisturizing.

reviews.headline: Not moisturizing ￼
reviews.comments: Don't be fooled by the jelly texture of this moisturizer. It looks the part but once applied dries up insanely quick. I do not have dehydrated skin where moisturizer should be sucked into my skin that fast. I am returning asap!

reviews.headline: Not worth your money
reviews.comments: This does not hydrate the skin AT ALL! It leaves a weird feeling film on your face, and after using your hands and face feel dry istead of moisturized. I would not recommend and definitely not worth your money.

reviews.headline: Absolutely not!
reviews.comments: Made my skin super dry! Idk how thats even possible!

reviews.headline: Absolutely not!
reviews.comments: Made my skin super dry! Idk how thats even possible!

reviews.headline: Would not recommend
reviews.comments: I got this hoping it would be a good cheap moisturizer but eveytime I used it made my skin feel tight and dry. I stopped using it after I noticed my skin being flakey.

reviews.headline: Best
reviews.comments: So in have combined type of skin snd im recommending this! It so moisturizing my skin, smells so good, and feel good on skin!

media.headline: Need to change the name to 'Un-Holy Dehydration'!!
media.caption: Taken 2/19/2024

media.headline: Need to change the name to 'Un-Holy Dehydration'!!
media.caption: Taken around November/December 2023

faceoff_positive.comments: How do I give that other review a thumbs down?  Calling a product horrible just because it didn't work for your skin type?! Rude.   This moisturizer feels so good on my combo skin! It makes my skin feel a little bouncy too!   I do top it with a Tatcha cream if I feel especially dry, but this is so good on its own too!
faceoff_positive.headline: So good!

faceoff_negative.comments: I reluctantly ordered & used this 'moisturizer' after I realized that the SuperHydrate Gel Moisturizer was discontinued with hopes that it would give me at least similar results. IT HAS NOT. This is the worst e.l.f. moisturizer I've ever used & it looks like I'm not the only one to realize it. I'm 49 with combination skin & the SuperHydrate moisturizer kept my skin glowing & perfectly moisturized all day long. I can't tell you how often I'd get compliments in how bright & glowy my skin was & questions about my regimen. I'm not a product junkie & prefer extremely simplified beauty routines, so I know SuperHydrate played a big part in my skin condition. In the 3 weeks since I started using Gel Yeah, my skin has deteriorated completely. I can literally feel moisture being sucked out of my skin & the feeling of an uncomfortable tightness all over my face. My forehead broke out in tiny, red bumps & all of a sudden I'm seeing these small lines across my forehead that I never noticed before. My skin is no longer smooth & dewy, but appears rough & dry & bumpy to the touch. I included a couple pics but my camera isn't that great, so the change may not seem drastic...but it's definitely evident in person smh. I'm over it & on the hunt for a more reliable moisturizer that actually benefits the skin. Try it at your own risk. To the decision makers at e.l.f., please for the love of all that is HOLY, bring back SuperHydrate in it's most recent formulation.
faceoff_negative.headline: Need to change the name to 'Un-Holy Dehydration'!!
